title: Looking for casuals :D
body:
Just bored and looking for people to play norms/arams with. Discord/skype/none I don't really mind. Idc what rank either. =)

Msg me on: fkn camp me more
(Dont be fazed by the name xD)

replies.body: I play norms/ranked so I'd love to have people to play stuff with.

I only ARAM (approaching 2500 wins), but you're welcome to join me.
Some of the people I play with have more ARAM wins than that.

I don't even care if you are bad (not saying that you are), I just play for fun.

I'm on every day (well, most days) only ARAM, only for fun.
You can feed and I don't care (as long as you're trying).
